title: Spectacular Slovakia #3: Bratislava, your unexpected hiking destination
itunes:author: The Slovak Spectator
itunes:summary: Hannah Falchuk, who recently returned to Slovakia as an English teacher within the Fulbright Programme, remembers last summer in Bratislava. Is the Slovak capital really one of the greenest cities in the world? What are the best places to go when you need to escape the urban rush? Listen to the podcast to discover that Bratislava is as good for a city break as it is for some light hiking. Hannah will also give you a secret tip on making a childhood dream come true.
itunes:subtitle: Hannah Falchuk, who recently returned to Slovakiaâ€¦
